describe.zh_CN: 总会有学者想尝试让崩解石碑过载，出乎意料的是，其爆炸后会生成一种物质，这种物质有着另其他物质塌陷的力量，但十分不稳定，会持续破坏周围方块。不过好在，对生物似乎没有什么影响。
describe.en_US: There are always scholars eager to attempt overloading the Collapse Stela. Surprisingly, its explosion yields a substance with the power to induce collapse in other materials, albeit highly unstable and causing continuous destruction of surrounding blocks. Fortunately, it seems to have no effect on living beings.
